form.label: CIP-010 R4: Transient Cyber Assets and Removable Media
form.description: Each Responsible Entity shall implement, except under CIP Exceptional Circumstances, one or more documented plan(s) for Transient Cyber Assets and Removable Media.

search.query: | inputlookup cip_asset_lookup.csv | search classification="*cip:eap*" | `get_esp_zone(zone)` | dedup zone sortby zone | fields zone
| inputlookup cip_asset_lookup.csv | search classification="*cip:eap*" | dedup location sortby location | fields location

html.h1: R4.1.1 - Responsible Entities shall manage Transient Cyber Asset(s), individually or by group

search.query: | inputlookup cip_asset_lookup.csv | fillnull category value="nerc unknown" | fillnull classification value="0-unknown" | fillnull location,asset_type value="Unknown" | fillnull zone value="esp:unknown" | search $esp_facility_tok$ $espZone_tok$ | eval ip=if(isnull(ip), "", ip) | makemv zone delim="|" | makemv category delim="|" | join type=left nt_host [| tstats `summariesonly` count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where All_Traffic.action="allowed" OR All_Traffic.action="unknown" by _time,All_Traffic.src | `drop_dm_object_name("All_Traffic")` | stats max(_time) as lastTime by src | lookup cip_asset_lookup.csv ip as src OUTPUT nt_host | fields nt_host,lastTime] | eval lastTime=if(isnull(lastTime), "Not Reported", lastTime) | eval minutesSinceLastReport=if(isnum(lastTime), round((now() - lastTime) / 60,1), "Not Reported") | `get_esp_zone(zone)` | search `get_cip_tca_assets(classification)` asset_type!="removable media" | table nt_host, ip, mac, zone, bunit, location,lastTime,minutesSinceLastReport | convert ctime(lastTime) | sort classification, nt_host | rename lastTime as "Last Activity", minutesSinceLastReport as "Last Reported", nt_host as Host, ip as IP, mac as MAC, zone as Zone, bunit as "Business Unit", location as Facility, category as "Category"

| tstats `summariesonly` values(All_Traffic.src) as sources from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where All_Traffic.action="allowed" by All_Traffic.src,All_Traffic.dvc,All_Traffic.dest | `drop_dm_object_name("All_Traffic")` | eval combined_field=src."|".dest."|".dvc | table src,dest,combined_field | fields combined_field | makemv delim="|" combined_field | mvexpand combined_field | lookup cip_ip_ranges.csv subnet as combined_field OUTPUTNEW location as ip_local | search ip_local!="NONE" | `get_cip_info_by_ip(combined_field, "host")` | eval host_classification=CASE( match(host_category, ".*TCA.*"), "TCA", isnull(host_classification), "Unclassified", 1=1, host_classification) | search host_classification="Unclassified" | eval nt_host=if(isnull(nt_host), combined_field, nt_host) | eval ip=combined_field, location=ip_local | dedup nt_host,ip | table nt_host,ip,ip_location | rename nt_host as Host, ip as IP, ip_local as "Subnet Location"

html.h1: R4.3 - Responsible Entities shall include sections in their plan(s) for Removable Media

search.query: | inputlookup cip_asset_lookup.csv | search asset_type="removable media" | search $esp_facility_tok$ $espZone_tok$ | join type=left nt_host [ search `get_removable_media_indexes` | lookup cip_asset_lookup.csv nt_host as Model OUTPUTNEW category as device_category | eval is_tca=CASE( match(device_category, ".*TCA.*"), "Yes", 1=1, "No") | search is_tca="Yes" | eventstats max(_time) as lastTime by ComputerName,Model | dedup ComputerName,Model,lastTime | eval lastTime=if(isnull(lastTime), "Not Reported", lastTime) | eval ComputerName=if(ComputerName="", "Ignore", ComputerName) | eval nt_host=Model | fields nt_host,lastTime,UserName,ComputerName] | eval lastTime=if(isnull(lastTime), "Not Reported", lastTime) | eval minutesSinceLastReport=if(isnum(lastTime), round((now() - lastTime) / 60,1), "Not Reported") | `get_esp_zone(zone)` | table ComputerName,nt_host, mac, zone, bunit,UserName, lastTime,minutesSinceLastReport | convert ctime(lastTime) | sort classification, nt_host | rename lastTime as "Last Activity", minutesSinceLastReport as "Last Reported", nt_host as Model, mac as MAC, zone as Zone, bunit as "Business Unit", ComputerName as Host

`get_removable_media_indexes` | lookup cip_asset_lookup.csv nt_host as ComputerName OUTPUTNEW site_id as dest_site_id,zone as dest_zone, classification, category | lookup cip_asset_lookup.csv nt_host as Model OUTPUTNEW category as device_category | fillnull dest_zone value="esp:unknown" | fillnull classification value="cip:unknown" | fillnull dest_site_id value="unknown" | fillnull device_category value="No" | eval is_tca=CASE( match(device_category, ".*TCA.*"), "Yes", 1=1, "No") | eventstats max(_time) as lastTime by ComputerName,Model | dedup ComputerName,Model,lastTime | eval lastTime=if(isnull(lastTime), "Not Reported", lastTime) | eval minutesSinceLastReport=if(isnum(lastTime), round((now() - lastTime) / 60,1), "Not Reported") | eval ComputerName=if(ComputerName="", "Ignore", ComputerName) | search ComputerName!="Ignore" | sort -lastUsed,is_tca | table is_tca,ComputerName,UserName,Model,lastTime,minutesSinceLastReport | rename ComputerName as Host, UserName as User, is_tca as "TCA Approved",lastTime as "Last Activity", minutesSinceLastReport as "Used" | convert ctime("Last Activity")
